page.title: 02Hoverton, Burnt Fen, Horning
page.content:
06320318 HOVETON: Area mainly arable with a small plantation for pheasant cover. the farmhouse North Farm is Elizabethan. It is let by the farmer/ land owner. The tenants do not have anything to do with farming.
06330318 BURNT FEN, HORNING Burnt Fen is an enclosed broad. Peat was dug from this site in 1495. The broad has decreased in size wih the encroaching of alder carr and reeds. The house is named after the broad and is the farmhouse. The resident farmer carries out arable cropping.
